product_name: AlpineAire Foods Southwestern Style Masa with Beef - 2 Servings
long_description: The AlpineAire Foods Southwestern Style Masa with Beef serves up 2 helpings of seasoned corn meal with beef, pinto and black beans, cheddar cheese, brown rice and vegetables.
short_description: The AlpineAire Foods Southwestern Style Masa with Beef serves up 2 helpings of seasoned corn meal with beef, pinto and black beans, cheddar cheese, brown rice and vegetables.
